<strong style="display: block;">Rf=1%. Market premium=4%. A stock with β=1.8. What is its required return under CAPM?</strong>

<label><input type="radio" name="module5_mcq_q75" value="B"> B. 8%</label><br>
<label><input type="radio" name="module5_mcq_q75" value="C"> C. 9%</label><br>
<label><input type="radio" name="module5_mcq_q75" value="D"> D. 10%</label><br>
<label><input type="radio" name="module5_mcq_q75" value="E"> E. 11%</label><br>
</form>

<div id="feedback-module5_mcq_q75" class="feedback" data-status="" style="display:none;">
